alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central DeKalb and southwestern Gwinnett Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Mountain Park, or 10 miles northwest of Conyers. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Snellville, Lilburn, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Tucker, North Decatur, Mountain Park, Redan and Scottdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
